codes.title: Bad Request
codes.msg: The server cannot process the request due to something that is perceived to be a client error.

codes.title: Unauthorized
codes.msg: The requested resource requires an authentication.

codes.title: Access Denied
codes.msg: The requested resource requires an authentication.

codes.title: Resource not found
codes.msg: The requested resource could not be found but may be available again in the future.

codes.title: Webservice currently unavailable
codes.msg: An unexpected condition was encountered. Our service team has been dispatched to bring it back online.

codes.title: Not Implemented
codes.msg: The Webserver cannot recognize the request method.

codes.title: Webservice currently unavailable
codes.msg: We've got some trouble with our backend upstream cluster. Our service team has been dispatched to bring it back online.

codes.title: Webservice currently unavailable
codes.msg: We've got some trouble with our backend upstream cluster. Our service team has been dispatched to bring it back online.

codes.title: Origin Error - Unknown Host
codes.msg: The requested hostname is not routed. Use only hostnames to access resources.

codes.title: Webservice currently unavailable
codes.msg: We've got some trouble with our backend upstream cluster. Our service team has been dispatched to bring it back online.

codes.title: Scheduled Maintenance
codes.msg: This site is currently down for maintenance. Our service team is working hard to bring it back online soon.
